description: Detects the execution of certutil with the "encode" flag to encode a file to base64 where the files are located in potentially suspicious locations
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: File In Suspicious Location Encoded To Base64 Via Certutil.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\certutil.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"CertUtil.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\-encode*" OR "*\/encode*") AND process.command_line.text:("*\\AppData\\Roaming\\*" OR "*\\Desktop\\*" OR "*\\Local\\Temp\\*" OR "*\\PerfLogs\\*" OR "*\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\Temp\\*" OR "*$Recycle.Bin*"))
